description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate-Berry-Pancake-Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chocolate cake,Strawberry,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Low salt,Sesame free,Peanut free,Pear
name: Chocolate-Berry-Pancake-Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare pancake mix following packet instructions. Pour into a large bowl, add cocoa and whisk until combined.
Pour a scoop of batter into a non-stick pan over low heat. Cook for 2 minutes, then flip and cook for a further 10 seconds. Set aside on a plate to cool. Repeat with remaining batter.
Spread cooled pancakes with choc hazelnut spread. Form pancakes into a stack, layering with pear slices and strawberries, reserving a handful of fruit to top. Serve.
